To use an existing Skill as a template for a new Skill, you can use the ![copy skill button](data:image/png;base64,) button available on a Skill row displayed on the Subject page. This will open a new Skill dialog populated with the details of the selected copy-from Skill. The name and id will be prepended with `Copy of` which can be changed before the new Skill is saved. Saving this dialog will create a new Skill that falls within the same Subject as the copy-from Skill.

> **TIP**
> Follow a 2-step process if you want to "copy" a skill into a different subject or group
>
> 1. copy the skill
> 2. Move the skill into another subject or group.
